assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Goa Carbon Limited manufactures and sells calcined petroleum coke in India and internationally. It offers its products to aluminum smelters, and graphite electrode and titanium dioxide manufacturers, as well as other users in the metallurgical and chemical industries. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Panaji, India. Goa Carbon Limited is a subsidiary of V. S. Dempo Holdings Private Limited.
